alert.note: Alert for Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 3:30PM EDT until August 28 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Gordon County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Redbud, or 8 miles east of Calhoun, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fairmount, Ranger, Sonoraville, Oakman, Redbud, Nickelsville and Audubon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
